colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B CES PA RANG LO NYER BZHI PA YAN CHAD KYI GSANG BA'I RNAM THAR SGRO SKUR GYI DRI MA MED PA 'DI NI, GSAM GTAN GLING BA RGYA MTSO PAD DKAR GYIS BSKUL TE, T'A RA N'A THA RANG NYID KYIS SMRAS PA STE BRAG STONG CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DU'O,, DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,@009A*, ,AOm SVASTI, RMAD BYUNG MDZAD PA ZLA BA LTAR DKAR BA, ,THABS MKHAS THUGS RJES SNA TSOGS RTOG BRJOD TSUL, ,DPAG YAS RLAB CHEN DU MAS 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,SGROL MDZAD BLA MA MCHOG GI RNAM PAR THAR, ,GRAGS PA'I 'OD ZER SEMS KYI MUN SEL BA'I, ,ZLA MED SKYES CHEN SPYOD PA 'DZAM GLING RGYAN, ,DRI MED NOR BU'I DO SHAL 'JIG RTEN DU, ,RTAG TU GZHAN PHAN BDE LEGS RTEN 'GYUR PHYIR, ,SRID ZHI'I PHUN TSOGS KUN 'DUS RGYAL KHAB CHER, ,RIG GNAS SMRA BA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,RAB DKAR LHAG BSAM DAG PAS DNGOS SBYAR TE, ,RNAM 'GYUR ZHES BYA LCAGS PHO STAG GI LOR, ,THUB BSTAN SNYING PO ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I DPAL, ,CHOS 'KHOR RAB RGYAS GLING DU SPAR DU BSKRUN, 'DI YI DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHAGS CHEN KUN GYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,RANG GZHAN RNAMS KYI GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG GI ,DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB SKU GSUM DPAL THOB SHOG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI, MDO SMAD PA SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA WA G'INDRA SHR'I BH'U TIS (NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
